inicioComponent.txt3:
I have two years of experience as a frontend developer.
Most of my knowledge has been acquired in a self-taught way.
I am currently developing large projects and learning new technologies.
inicioComponent.txt4: If you want to know more about my work, I invite you to continue exploring my portfolio.

trabajosComponent.title: MY WORKS
trabajosComponent.description1: One of the funniest projects I've done, my own website.
trabajosComponent.description2: I was lucky enough to work developing the DataiFX main website focused on the core business of the company.
trabajosComponent.subtitle3: Main and administrative page of Kuepa Edutech
trabajosComponent.description3: I had the opportunity to work with great professionals in several applications within the main and administrative page of Kuepa, which are also used by various educational entities.
trabajosComponent.description4: It is the first technical test carried out to enter a company, it was a very entertaining challenge at the time.
